title: Insomnia Restaurant Bar Lounge
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A neighborhood favorite known for serving a menu of international comfort foods, including vegan choices,  with an extensive cocktail list. Serves brunch. Live DJs start spinning the right songs for the right crowd at 10pm. Full menu available until 2am, 7 days a week.
